title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Frontend Developer to join our growing team. You will work with React, Vue, and modern JavaScript frameworks.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Join our backend team and build scalable APIs. Experience with Node.js, Python, or Go required.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end solutions with React and Node.js. Work on exciting projects from concept to deployment.

title: Data Scientist
description: Work with machine learning models and big data. Python, TensorFlow, and SQL expertise required.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines. Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS experience needed.
